Articles.Content:
this is going to be an updated version of my old thread: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52205-history-of-aviation-from-the-start](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52205-history-of-aviation-from-the-start)

if you think i should make something just say it

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-15T20:03:48Z" title="05/15/2015 08:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 15, 2015</time> by AtleSt**

Winged kerbal

year: unknown

pilot: some stupid kerbal

outcome: if squashed is an outcome...

Back story: we found some drawings in a cave an guessed

![l5z7dp3.png](http://i.imgur.com/l5z7dp3.png)

![9jbV8fL.png](http://i.imgur.com/9jbV8fL.png)

Felix's Fail

Year: 1874

pilot: Felix Kerman

outcome: Nothing good really

back story: just somebody who wanted to fly faster horizontally than the hot air balloons

![nptFy3l.png](http://i.imgur.com/nptFy3l.png)

![OtJjG0Q.png](http://i.imgur.com/OtJjG0Q.png)

Kright Flyer

Year: 1903

pilot: Lorville Kright Kerman

outcome: successful, and with style ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

![ku863dc.png](http://i.imgur.com/ku863dc.png)
